name: The Honorable Deborah D. Cianfrani
assigned: PA - Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas
bio:
The Hon. Deborah D. Cianfrani is a judge for the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas in Pennsylvania. She was elected to the bench on November 7, 2017.

Cianfrani earned a B.A. in philosophy from Cornell College in 1987. She then completed a J.D. at Western New England University School of Law in 1990.

After graduating from law school, Cianfrani began her legal career as a trial attorney for the Philadelphia Defenders Association. She served in that capacity until 1998, at which time she became a founding partner at Cianfrani Law. While in private practice, Cianfrani specialized in personal injury and legal transactions matters, working as legal counsel to Healing Hurt People and the Veterans Multi-Service Center.

Cianfrani is registered as a Democrat.
